p: The rhizomes of I. hungarica Waldst. et Kit., I. pallida Lam., I. sibirica L. and I. variegata L. were obtained from the collections of M.M. Gryshko National Botanical Garden of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine (Kyiv, Ukraine) in October 2018. They were identified and authenticated by Dr. Buidin (Department of the Ornamental Plants, National Botanical Garden). Voucher specimens (CWN0056548, CWN0056549, CWN0056545, CWN0056534) were identified by Dr. Gamulya and were deposited at Herbarium of V.M. Karazin Kharkiv National University (Kharkiv, Ukraine).
